reviews.customers_say: Customers find the Christmas sweater soft, cozy, and made of nice material, with one describing it as almost like cashmere. They appreciate its appearance, with one noting it looks and feels expensive, and consider it great for the holiday season. The fit and color receive mixed feedback - while some say it fits perfectly, others find it runs big, and while some like the red color, others note it's very orange.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and High Quality Sweater
items.body: LOVE! This sweater is perfect for the holiday season. I bought the black JOLLY sweater. The fit is good. It’s a heavier weight sweater, so it looks and feels expensive. It’s so soft! I’m so happy I got this! Read more
items.author: Shells

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice Sweater
items.body: This is a heavy sweater for those chilly Christmas nights. Washed in cold water and dried on low heat. I wear an xxlg and it was true to size. Recommend purchasing this sweater! Read more
items.author: Co

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun sweater for the holidays
items.body: This sweater is so fun. I ordered this to wear to a holiday event and will be wearing it a lot this month. It’s super soft, the fit is exactly as described. I orders a large for a more roomier fit and it’s just right. It’s the perfect shade of navy. Read more
items.author: Mary Ann McNicholas

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars RED IS NOT RED!!!!!
items.body: Sweater was fine but the red sweater is VERY orange. If you want a red Christmas sweater this is not for you! Read more
items.author: Mary Grim

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and soft
items.body: I absolutely love this sweater. Its is comfy and soft. In the picture it was hard to tell if the trees were actually knit onto the sweater or if they were printed. I can confirm that it is printed and not knitted. The material is soft and lightly fussy. It is not scratchy or uncomfortable. This would be a great lounge around by the fire place sweater, or go out to a Christmas party. Read more
items.author: Evw

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love!
items.body: Good quality and super cute. Read more
items.author: Jennifer Lester

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater.
items.body: Great sweater. Great quality, soft and comfy order to size medium, and it is more oversized. Wished I would’ve gotten a small. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Christmas Sweater
items.body: Quality material. Try to size guide. Read more
items.author: Teresa

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red Christmas Tree, Green Bright, Black Jolly, Red Merry New, Orange Red, Red Merry, Red White, Green, Dark Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
